summary: CypherSafe: A secure note-taking app with encrypted storage on ICP blockchain, optimized for both mobile and desktop use with responsive design and keyboard shortcuts
architectural_notes: Uses ICP blockchain for encrypted note storage and cross-device sync
Responsive breakpoint at 1024px for desktop optimization
Focus mode provides distraction-free full-screen editing

existing_features.title: Implement responsive side-by-side layout for screens wider than 1024px: left panel displays the notes list, right panel displays the full-screen editor (focus mode)
Add keyboard shortcut Ctrl+N to create a new note
Add keyboard shortcut Ctrl+S to save the current note
Add keyboard shortcut Esc to exit focus mode editor
Display a golden notification prompting desktop users to install CypherSafe with the message: 'Install CypherSafe on your Desktop for a larger writing canvas.'
Verify that notes saved on mobile via ICP blockchain are instantly visible on the PC version using the same Internet Identity login

new_feature_requests.summary: Responsive side-by-side layout for desktop (>1024px): left panel with note list, right panel with full-screen editor
PC keyboard shortcuts: Ctrl+N (new note), Ctrl+S (save), Esc (exit focus mode)
Desktop install prompt with golden notification for desktop browsers
Cloud sync via ICP blockchain ensuring notes are instantly visible across mobile and PC with same login
